name: archive_campaign
description: Archives a campaign, excluding it from campaign listing results.

name: cancel_marketing_event
description: Marks an event as cancelled.

externalEventId.description: Unique identifier for the marketing event from the external system where it was created.

externalAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the event's originating account.

name: clone_marketing_email
description: Clone an existing marketing email.

email_id.description: The required ID of the marketing email to clone.

name.description: The required name for the new, cloned email.

name: create_campaign
description: Creates a new campaign.

start_year.description: The start year of the campaign.

start_month.description: The start month of the campaign.

start_day.description: The start day of the campaign.

end_year.description: The end year of the campaign.

end_month.description: The end month of the campaign.

end_day.description: The end day of the campaign.

color_label.description: The color label of the campaign.

name: create_form
description: Creates a new marketing form.

submitText.description: The label for the submit button.

groupType.description: The type of the field group.

richTextType.description: The type of rich text included. The default value is text.

richText.description: A block of rich text or an image. Those can be used to add extra information for the customers filling in the form. If the field group includes fields, the rich text will be displayed before the fields.

fieldType.description: The type of the field. Can be one of: email, phone, mobile_phone, single_line_text, multi_line_text, number, single_checkbox, multiple_checkboxes, dropdown, radio, datepicker, file, payment_link_radio

placeholder.description: The placeholder text of the field.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the field.

fields.description: The fields of the field group.

label.description: The main label for the form field

communicationsCheckboxes.description: A list of checkboxes for explicit consent to communications.

consentToProcessCheckboxLabel.description: The text label for the consent to process checkbox.

consentToProcessFooterText.description: The footer text for the explicit consent to process.

privacyText.description: The text for the explicit consent to process option.

consentToProcessText.description: The text of the explicit consent to process.

explicitConsentToProcess.description: The explicit consent options for processing data.

label.description: The main label for the form field

communicationsCheckboxes.description: An array of checkboxes used to collect consent for communications.

communicationConsentText.description: The text for the communication consent statement.

type.description: Specifies the type of implicit consent.

privacyText.description: The text of the privacy notice for implicit consent to process data.

consentToProcessText.description: Specifies the text for the implicit consent to process notice.

implicitConsentToProcess.description: A set of options for implicit consent to process data.

lawfulBasis.description: The lawful basis for the consent.

privacyText.description: The privacy text for the legitimate interest.

legitimateInterest.description: Options for the legitimate interest legal basis.

legalConsentOptions.description: The legal consent options for the form, defaulting to `None`.

name: create_form_global_event_subscription
description: Creates a new webhook subscription for global form events.

subscribed.description: A boolean indicating if the contact is subscribed to the subscription.

subscriptionDetails.description: A dictionary specifying the subscription definition details, including `contact_id` (str), `subscription_id` (str), `subscribed` (bool), and `opt_in_date` (str).

name: create_marketing_email
description: Creates a new marketing email.

name.description: The required internal name of the email.

subject.description: The email subject line; defaults to None.

htmlBody.description: The HTML body of the email, defaulting to `None`.

isTransactional.description: Indicates whether the email is transactional; defaults to `False`.

status.description: The email's status, such as 'scheduled' or 'sent'. Defaults to None.

discount_code.description: Discount code for promotional emails; defaults to `None`.

expiration.description: Expiration date for time-limited offers; defaults to None.

launch_date.description: Launch date for product announcements, defaulting to None.

sale_end_date.description: The end date for sales promotions, defaulting to None.

reward_points.description: The number of reward points for loyalty program emails (default: `None`).

access_code.description: An access code for VIP or exclusive offers. Defaults to `None`.

name: create_marketing_event
description: Creates a marketing event.

externalEventId.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event from the external system where it was created.

externalAccountId.description: Unique identifier for the account in the external system where the event was created.

event_name.description: The name of the marketing event.

start_date_time.description: Start date and time of the marketing event.

end_date_time.description: The marketing event's end date and time.

event_url.description: A URL with additional information about the marketing event.

selectedByUser.description: Whether the property was selected by the user.

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the property.

sourceMetadata.description: Source metadata encoded as a base64 string.

useTimestampAsPersistenceTimestamp.description: Whether to use timestamp as persistence timestamp.

custom_properties.description: A set of custom properties associated with the marketing event, where each property is structured as a dictionary.

name: create_or_update_marketing_event_attendee
description:
**Rewritten Description (brief and clear):**
Create or update an attendee for a marketing event.

externalEventId.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event as provided by the external system where it was created.

externalAccountId.description: A unique identifier for the account where the event was created.

email.description: The email address of the attendee.

joinedAt.description: The date and time when the attendee joined the event.

leftAt.description: The date and time when the attendee left the event.

name: create_template
description: Create a new coded template object in Design Manager.

created.description: The creation date as milliseconds since epoch, defaulting to the current time.

template_type.description: The type of template to create, defaulting to 2 (Email template); valid integer values include 2 (Email), 4 (Page), 11 (Error), 12 (Subscription preferences), 13 (Backup unsubscribe page), 14 (Subscriptions update confirmation), 19 (Password prompt page), 27 (Search results), 29 (Membership login), 30 (Membership registration), 31 (Membership reset password confirmation), and 32 (Membership reset password request).

category_id.description: The category type, defaulting to 2 (Email); valid values include 0 (Unmapped), 1 (Landing Pages), 2 (Email), 3 (Blog Post), and 4 (Site Page).

folder.description: The folder where the template is saved; defaults to `/templates/`.

path.description: The template's save path; defaults to `/home/templates/`.

is_available_for_new_content.description: Whether the template is available for new content; defaults to `False`.

name: delete_form
description: Archive a form.

formId.description: The ID of the form to archive.

name: delete_form_global_event_subscription
description: Delete (unsubscribe) a webhook subscription.

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscription definition.

name: delete_marketing_email
description: Delete a marketing email.

email_id.description: The required unique ID of the marketing email to delete.

name: delete_marketing_event
description: Delete a marketing event.

externalEventId.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event from the external system where it was created.

externalAccountId.description: The unique identifier for the account where the event was created.

name: delete_marketing_event_attendee
description: Remove an attendee from a marketing event.

externalEventId.description: Unique identifier for the marketing event from the external system where it was created.

attendeeId.description: The unique identifier for the attendee.

externalAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the event's creating account.

name: delete_template_by_id
description: Marks the selected Template as deleted, allowing it to be restored later via a POST to the restore-deleted endpoint.

deleted_at.description: The template's deletion timestamp in milliseconds since epoch, defaulting to the current timestamp if not provided.

name: get_campaign_by_id
description: Get a single campaign by its ID.

name: get_campaigns
description: Returns a list of marketing campaigns.

limit.description: The maximum number of campaigns to return.

offset.description: The number of campaigns to skip.

created_at__gt.description: Filters campaigns created after a specified date.

created_at__gte.description: Filters campaigns by a creation date greater than or equal to the specified date.

created_at__lt.description: Filters campaigns created before a specified date.

created_at__lte.description: Filters campaigns created on or before a specified date.

updated_at.description: A string to filter campaigns by their update date.

updated_at__gt.description: Filter campaigns by update date after a specified date.

updated_at__gte.description: Filters campaigns where the update date is greater than or equal to a specified date.

updated_at__lt.description: Filters campaigns by update date less than the specified date.

updated_at__lte.description: Filters campaigns with an update date less than or equal to the specified date.

name__contains.description: Filter campaigns by name containing a specific string.

name__icontains.description: Filters campaigns by name for a specific string, case-insensitively.

name__ne.description: Filter campaigns by name, excluding those that match the specified string.

id.description: The ID string used to filter campaigns.

id__ne.description: A string used to filter campaigns, excluding those with an ID equal to its value.

type__ne.description: Filters campaigns by type, excluding a specific string value.

name: get_form_by_id
description: Get a Marketing Form by ID.

name: get_form_global_event_subscription_definitions
description: Get all global form event subscription definitions.

name: get_form_global_event_subscriptions
description: Get all webhook subscriptions for global form events.

name: get_forms
description: Get all marketing forms.

after.description: The `id` of the form to start after.

limit.description: The maximum number of forms to return.

created_at.description: The date the form was created.

created_at__gt.description: An ISO 8601 date string to filter forms created after.

created_at__gte.description: The date the form was created on or after.

created_at__lt.description: The date before which the form was created.

created_at__lte.description: The date the form was created on or before.

updated_at.description: The date the form was updated, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at__gt.description: The date after which the form was updated.

updated_at__gte.description: Specifies the date the form was updated on or after.

updated_at__lt.description: The date before which a form was updated.

updated_at__lte.description: The date (as a string) on or before which forms must have been updated.

name: get_marketing_email_by_id
description: Retrieves a marketing email by its ID.

email_id.description: Required unique ID of the marketing email.

name: get_marketing_event_attendees
description: Get attendees of a marketing event.

externalEventId.description: The unique identifier for the marketing event in its external creation system.

limit.description: The maximum number of attendees to return, defaulting to 10 and capped at 100.

after.description: A cursor used for pagination to retrieve the next set of results.

name: get_marketing_event_by_id
description: Get a marketing event by its external ID.

externalEventId.description: A unique identifier for the marketing event within the external system where it was created.

externalAccountId.description: The unique ID of the event's originating account.

name: get_marketing_events
description: Get all marketing events.

occurredAfter.description: Filter events that occurred after this timestamp.

occurredBefore.description: A timestamp string for filtering events that occurred before it.

limit.description: Maximum number of events to return.

name: get_template_by_id
description: Gets a specific template by ID.

template_id.description: The unique identifier of the template.

name: get_templates
description: Get all templates, supporting paging and filtering.

limit.description: The maximum number of templates to return; defaults to 20.

offset.description: The starting offset for returned templates; defaults to 0.

deleted_at.description: A deletion timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, used to filter templates.

is_available_for_new_content.description: Filter by availability for new content, expecting a string boolean value (e.g., 'True' or 'False').

name: restore_deleted_template
description: Restores a previously deleted template.

name: send_single_email_with_template
description: Send a single transactional email using a pre-existing template.

template_id.description: ID of the pre-existing transactional email template to send.

email.description: Required. Email address of the recipient.

to.description: A list of one or more recipient objects.

email.description: Required. Email address of the CC recipient.

cc.description: A list of carbon copy (CC) recipient objects.

email.description: Required. Email address of the BCC recipient.

bcc.description: An array of recipient objects to be included in the BCC field.

email.description: The required email address of the sender.

replyTo.description: A list of reply-to email addresses.

message.description: An object containing the email content and recipient information.

customProperty1.description: A value for the first custom property.

customProperty2.description: The value for the second custom property.

customProperties.description: An object containing key-value pairs for template personalization.

lastName.description: The last name of the contact.

contactProperties.description: An object containing the contact's property values to personalize the email.

name: send_transactional_email
description: Send a single transactional email.

htmlBody.description: The HTML body of the email.

cc.description: The email address(es) of the carbon copy (CC) recipients.

bcc.description: A list of email addresses to be blind carbon copied.

replyTo.description: The email address to which replies should be sent.

message.description: An object containing the email content and recipient information.

customProperties.description: Custom key-value pairs to use for email personalization.

name: update_campaign
description: Updates an existing campaign by its ID, modifying specified attributes.

start_month.description: The start month of the campaign.

start_day.description: The start day of the campaign.

end_year.description: The end year of the campaign.

end_day.description: The end day of the campaign.

name: update_form
description: Updates a marketing form.

formId.description: The unique identifier of the form to update.

name.description: The new name for the form.

submitText.description: The new text for the form's submit button.

groupType.description: The type of the field group.

richTextType.description: The type of rich text included. The default value is text.

richText.description: A block of rich text or an image. Those can be used to add extra information for the customers filling in the form. If the field group includes fields, the rich text will be displayed before the fields.

fieldType.description: The type of the field. Can be one of: email, phone, mobile_phone, single_line_text, multi_line_text, number, single_checkbox, multiple_checkboxes, dropdown, radio, datepicker, file, payment_link_radio

placeholder.description: The placeholder text of the field.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the field.

fields.description: The fields of the field group.

fieldGroups.description: The updated collection of field groups for the form.

label.description: The main label for the form field

communicationsCheckboxes.description: A list of checkboxes for communication consent.

communicationConsentText.description: The text for the communication consent option.

consentToProcessCheckboxLabel.description: The text label for the consent checkbox.

consentToProcessFooterText.description: The footer text for the explicit consent to process section.

type.description: Specifies the type of explicit consent to process.

privacyText.description: The text for the privacy consent.

consentToProcessText.description: Specifies the text for the consent to process statement.

explicitConsentToProcess.description: The options for explicit consent to process user data.

label.description: The main label for the form field

communicationsCheckboxes.description: A list of checkboxes for communication consent.

communicationConsentText.description: The text for obtaining implicit consent for communication.

privacyText.description: The text for the privacy policy.

consentToProcessText.description: The text for the implicit consent to process.

implicitConsentToProcess.description: Options for implicit consent to process data.

privacyText.description: Privacy text for the legitimate interest legal basis.

legitimateInterest.description: An object containing the legitimate interest options.

legalConsentOptions.description: The new legal consent options for the form, which default to `None`.

name: update_form_global_event_subscription
description: Updates a webhook subscription by activating or deactivating it.

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscription definition.

active.description: Whether the subscription definition is active.

name: update_marketing_email
description: Updates an existing marketing email.

email_id.description: The unique ID of the marketing email to update (required).

htmlBody.description: The HTML body of the email.

status.description: The status of the email, such as 'scheduled' or 'sent'.

reward_points.description: The number of reward points for loyalty program emails.

access_code.description: Access code for VIP or exclusive offers.

name: update_marketing_event
description: Updates a marketing event.

externalEventId.description: The external system's unique identifier for the marketing event.

externalAccountId.description: Unique identifier of the account where the event was created.

start_date_time.description: Start date and time of the marketing event.

end_date_time.description: End date and time of the marketing event.

event_url.description: A URL for additional details about the marketing event.

selectedByUser.description: Whether the property was selected by the user.

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the property.

sourceMetadata.description: Source metadata encoded as a base64 string.

useTimestampAsPersistenceTimestamp.description: Whether to use timestamp as persistence timestamp.

custom_properties.description: A dictionary of custom properties associated with the marketing event.

name: update_template_by_id
description: Updates a template by modifying only the provided fields.

category_id.description: An integer representing the category type: `0` (Unmapped), `1` (Landing Pages), `2` (Email), `3` (Blog Post), `4` (Site Page).

folder.description: The destination folder for the template.

template_type.description: An integer representing the type of template (e.g., `2` for Email, `4` for Page, `11` for Error).

source.description: The source code of the template.

created.description: Unix timestamp of creation in milliseconds.

deleted_at.description: A Unix timestamp in milliseconds marking the time of deletion.

is_available_for_new_content.description: Specifies whether the template is available for new content.

archived.description: Specifies whether the template is archived.

source.description: The source code of this version.

versions.description: An array of objects, where each object represents a template version.
